dialogs.string: ludum ludum ludum ludum
ludum2 ludum2 ludum2 ludum2
Oh no ...
Oh no? I'm here to help.
Help ? This elevator is a one way ticket, you are now as traped here, same as the rest of us !
And where is here ?
Based on text on walls, it's called sanctuary ...
Only way out is to activate elevator but ...
Controll pannel is locked by keys ...
Where are the keys ?
Hiden around undegrounds. I will cast spell on you, so if you die you will return here back in time.
If you have sutch powerful spell to safly explore undegrounds why not look for them your self ?
Of Course we have tride, but after so many deaths we lost hope. Maby you will do better.
What now ? Go and look for keys !
Right ...
Hmmm ...
It looks to be some teleporting stone.
I think i can make it work. It might be my only way in.
Hmm... looks like there is no teleporting stone back.
Guess that solves why nobody ever came back from expeditions.
I do wonder where everyone is ... if they are still alive.
Can you believe it? I've finally made it to the ruins, but to my surprise, there's no sign of any expedition members. I wonder what happened to them.
I should get moving.
